title: Did NYC Mayor Bill de Blasio Once Support the Sandinista Govt. in Nicaragua?
subtitle: In May 2019, social media posts targeted the would-be 2020 Democratic presidential nominee for his past political positions, as well as his decision to change his name.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: New York Mayor Bill de Blasio was previously named "Warren Wilhelm Jr." and once supported the socialist government of the Sandinistas in Nicaragua.
